I was attracted by the dangling quarter moon and the way the upper strand of the piece complemented the lower one. I always wear a choker of some kind but with this piece I don't need to because of the aforementioned upper piece.  A must-have necklace for pagans, witches, goth, and other fashionable people.
Bought for a witch costume. Great quality.

The necklace itself was very nice. Very good for a goth like appearance. Or just a smidge of it. The only drawback to this is that it did not come with a box. So, because I was giving it for Christmas. I wanted a box. And I was able to find one (at wm). If you search for jewelry boxes, you will find ones that you can buy in bulk. Obviously, I did not want that. So I was thrilled to find one single one. And it came with cotton, so it was meant for a necklace. And I was happy.  But for gifting purposes, I did not like that it was not an easy presentation, and I took one star off for that.
Bought it for my niece for Christmas and she loved it.
Came in quick and is super cute. Doesn't seem easily breakable either which is great.
Used for a Halloween costume and worked Perfectly. Good quality
Great quality necklace, not cheap and flimsy. Heavy duty material.

The necklace arrived timely, well packaged and damaged free. The beads are cut and reflective/shiny. I put these on my daughters who were in a wedding, ages 4 and 2, they fit well (they have an adjustable chain) and looked great. The moon piece is flat painted metal.
I love the necklace. I love the beads. It’s a beautiful necklace. Goes great with a witchy look.

评论概述: black paint comes off easily and there should be a 24/7 worn version
评论详情: i absolutely adored the black moon necklace and wore it for a couple months. the design is just my kinda thing and it made me feel super stylish B) however, the paint on the moon comes off very easily, which just made it silver instead of black. it also gets caught on things often. sometimes it'll get stuck in hair or get caught on my bag. the moon pendant even ripped off completely because it caught on to my backpack. put it back on and wore it a bit more before it completely rusted due to my inevitable laziness in taking it off around water. i love it so much, but i just wish it wasn't stainless steel and instead was something like sterling silver so i could wear it 24/7.
Looks great. Very cute.
This is so cute! I love it!
I love this necklace. Good quality and goes with everything!
Just buy it, I love this necklace.

Love the double string of sparkling black beads…. very complimentary with any colors worn. Love the moon theme. Love that it can be worn reversed, depending on moon phase. Not just a goth necklace; anyone will find it attractive, because it is so unusual. Happy & cannot wait to wear it out!
